posts.post_content:
For sale - Just back from grading is this N28 Allen And Ginter Mike Kelly card graded PSA 1.5mk. Please see scans. I wish I had a V600 scanner for better scans but this is all I have right now.

Please let me know if you have any questions.

Price is $3,000.00 net to me shipped. If you are in the Philadelphia PA. area we can meet for an exchange. I can travel some if needed. Otherwise paypal family and friends or add the typical 2.5% to cover fees.

Thanks,
Bob
